public class SpanishLemmatizer

Implements a lemmatizer for Spanish nouns

Lemmatize

public java.lang.String Lemmatize(java.lang.String term)
Method Lemmatize Lemmatizes the term according to a lot of rules. Terms should be normalized, that is lowercase and without accents.

private boolean eEnding1(char last)
Method eEnding1 Checks if the last letter is of the letters where words nearly always end with -e These are: -b, -v, -f, -p, -j, -t, -c, -m

vowel

private boolean vowel(char b)
Method vowel Checks if a letter is a vowel. A letter is a vowel if it is a, e, i, o, u or y.

consonant

private boolean consonant(char b)
Method consonant Checks if a letter is a consonant. A letter is a consonant if it's not a vowel.
